long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Need to get DriveX access links but don't wish to leave the page you're currently on?

Let your employees create vehicle inspection links without  integration! Our Chrome extension enables submitting vehicle requests without signing into DriveX Admin.

➤ How it works
1. Use your credentials to authenticate. 
2. Insert vehicle data & press "Capture request"
3. Send the generated link (and/or QR-code) to your customer
